meta.name: Primal
meta.description: Primal is about the unlikely friendship between a dinosaur on the brink his species' extinction, and a caveman at the dawn of his species' evolution, who become each other's only hope for survival in a primitive landscape.

videos.title: Spear and Fang
videos.overview: Tragedy forces a caveman and a dinosaur to rely upon each other for their survival.

videos.title: River of Snakes
videos.overview: Man and beast are challenged to find a way to exist together.

videos.title: A Cold Death
videos.overview: In the harshness of the primordial winter a herd of woolly mammoths hunt for the murderers of one of their own.

videos.title: Terror Under the Blood Moon
videos.overview: The horrors of the red night challenges Spear and Fang for their very survival.

videos.title: Rage of the Ape-Men
videos.overview: An oasis of peace only leads to a brutal attack from a vicious tribe of ape-like men.

videos.title: Plague of Madness
videos.overview: Spear and Fang take on an infection with zombified dinosaurs.

videos.title: Scent of Prey
videos.overview: Spear struggles to nurse Fang back to health and escape the scavengers of the primordial world.

videos.title: Coven of the Damned
videos.overview: A tribe of mysterious, primitive women seek to further their coven by using dark magic on Spear and Fang.

videos.title: The Night Feeder
videos.overview: A horrific unseen terror stalks the night as well as our heroes, Spear and Fang.

videos.title: Slave of the Scorpion
videos.overview: Spear and Fang are confronted by a far more developed human than they've ever encountered before.

videos.title: Sea of Despair
videos.overview: Spear and Fang venture into the unknown to rescue Mira from her captors.

videos.title: Shadow of Fate
videos.overview: Spear and Fang get separated in a strange new land.

videos.title: Dawn of Man
videos.overview: The quest to find Mira leads Spear and Fang to the village of fearsome warriors.

videos.title: The Red Mist
videos.overview: Spear and Fang fight to save Mira from the warrior clan that enslaved her.

videos.title: The Primal Theory
videos.overview: A night of horrors reveals the true nature of man's origin.

videos.title: Vidarr
videos.overview: Spear, Fang, and Mira are hunted by the last survivors of a village decimated by their carnage.

videos.title: The Colossaeus
videos.overview: Spear, Fang, and Mira's journey home is threatened after encountering a mysterious threat at sea.

videos.title: The Colossaeus, Part III
videos.overview: Spear, Fang and Mira lead a daring escape from the Colossaeus and the Queen bent on their destruction.

videos.title: Echoes of Eternity
videos.overview: An old vengeance returns to wreak havoc.
